ygData.subject: Effects of DEX/WIS
ygData.msgSnippet: Anyone else heard that DEX is the # 1 roll check for skill successes? Reading eq.castersrealm.com check the necro creation guide, and it states this.   Anyone
ygData.messageBody:
Anyone else heard that DEX is the # 1 roll check for skill successes?
Reading eq.castersrealm.com check the necro creation guide, and it states
this. Anyone try anything with DEX? I have a jeweling paladin and can get
his WIS up to 162/171 with gear and over 180 with buffs. Havent tried DEX
although later tonight I intend on trying with a Shaman DEX buff to see if I
find a difference.
Let me know what yall think
Maledicta Soulstealer 47 necro gnome
Bertox
